document.full_text: former secretary of state henry kissinger is considering an offer from fifa president sepp blatter to take up a role in his new anti-corruption committee, he said sunday.
document.title: kissinger ponders blatter's offer of fifa "wise men" role
lines_and_colors: former secretary of state henry kissinger is considering an offer from fifa president sepp blatter to take up a role in his new anti-corruption committee, he said sunday.
